item.title: 키움 API Tick Data - Day1
item.description: Contents 0. Necessity of making precise time index 1. Filter for a certain Stocks [특정주식으로 필터링 하기] 2. Use time object in python 3. Calculate latency and clean it [레이턴시 계산 및 정리] 4. Get Trade Direction Indicator Source div.rcode pre { background-color:#fffff0; } div.rcode pre.r { background-color:#EDF6FA; } div.pycode pre { background-color:#fffff0; } div.pycode pre.python { background-color:#FFE9E9; } body, td { font-size: 20px; } code.
